content.description: Sit start with hands matched on the large jug. From there, reach an edge at the lip, follow with the other hand to the shelf (there are intermediate edges as well), match hands, commit to the slab, and finish for an easy top out.
content.protection: A pad will suffice. The landing is very good.
content.location: It climbs the south face of Roger Roger.

climbs.name: Sublime Prince of the Royal Secret

content.description: Sit start with a low left hand crimp, a right hand block-edge, and high right foot edge. Pull up, stick a right hand sloper-edge, bump the left hand up to an edge, then make a big move to a left hand crimp, move to an irregular right hand at the seam, then finish up the remaining dihedral to top it out.
content.protection: A pair of pads will work. The landing has a rock in it, but it pads up nicely, the remaining area is clear.
content.location: It climbs the south face of Roger Roger.
